description: Their wages have always been low. With rising inflation and falling prices paid by Western companies for clothing, they're protesting for better pay — and hoping the new government will spur change.
title: Why the garment workers of Bangladesh are feeling poorer than ever

description: The U.S. Department of Transportation penalty against American Airlines comes after "numerous serious violations of the laws protecting airline passengers with disabilities" over a four-year period.
title: American Airlines fined $50 million for its treatment of passengers with disabilities

description: On the campaign trail, former President Donald Trump has threatened to jail reporters who won't give up the sources of leaks and to strip networks of their broadcast licenses for fact-checking him.
title: Jailed reporters, silenced networks: What Trump says he'd do to the media if elected
